instructions: # [Adventurers Revised Edition](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/120987/Adventurers-Revised-2Pages-Edition)* by [GRAmel Books](https://www.wydawnictwogramel.pl)* Roll20 character sheet by [hbCyber](https://hbcyber.site)**Features:*** Convenient buttons to roll normally, with advantage or with disadvantage.* Derived stats, movement rate and Str-based encumbrance are automatically calculated for you.* Easily apply modifiers to stats to automatically affect the rolls (including Att and Def rolls) when needed.* Organize skills (including powers), weapons, armor and items with their Att and Def values automatically calculated for you.* Chat buttons to output all important components of your character sheet to the chat.* GM mode to input and roll NPCs stats in a condensed manner.
